criminalRecord:
The subject has been wandering around DisSea for a long time, and is the origin of the urban legend "Sinner of Death".

According to data analysis, the body mutation of the subject is highly similar to that of Corruptors, and has contagion like the Corruptors, possessing risks of further spreading the infection in DisCity.

--

Since her detention, the subject's severe Mania mutation has been alleviated with Chief's help, and rumors about sightings of the so-called //Sinner Grim Reaper// have gradually died down.

In addition, the assistance and care the subject receives from other Sinners in the MBCC have lowered her risk of contagion to the minimum. She's now virtually harmless to society.
mutationAssessment:
+++* Ability Summary
The subject's special power can drain the life of living beings with means beyond scientific explanation, which will continue the subject's life.

+++* Awakening Signs
Suffered from illness where crystals constantly grew on the body. The crystals and explosions resonated and gave the subject special powers and new life. It is speculated that the strange disease recovered, regenerated and awakened simultaneously. The reason is unknown.

+++* Corruption State
Suffers from extremely severe infection and almost shows no sign of life, while showing characteristics of human, Sinner, Corruptor, and even corpse. The data of the subject's vital signs cannot be detected with the Bureau's equipment.
interrogation1:
The [[[Chief]]] receives a letter from [[[Langley]]] congratulating them on their progress investigating [[[Mania]]], [[[Corruptor| Corruptors]]], and [[[DisSea]]]. She hints that the next step to understand more is to interrogate NOX, whom she calls "the //living person// closest to the truth of DisSea." When the Chief enters the interrogation room, NOX immediately asks if they need "saving", although their end is still far away. Unperturbed by the strange question, the Chief questions her about the urban legend of the //Sinner Grim Reaper//. Although she is mostly unresponsive to questioning, NOX does not deny that identity, and says that although she has never called herself by that name, she likes it. When asked about her victims' last words, a cloud of gray mist pours out of her and the room echoes with the sounds of desperate, fearful cries from people about to die. Nox explains that she killed people because she heard the voices in their hearts that they wanted to survive; when the Chief responds angrily, she continues that that "the barrier has to be removed, in order to resist the summoning of DisSea" -- she is adding their souls to her own collective will because individual spirits are too feeble on their own. NOX suddenly becomes disturbed and cries that the Chief is dangerous and must be saved. The gray mist flows out of her again, and the Chief attempts to stop her with the [[[Shackles]]] but is mentally rebuffed by the screaming voices of the dead. They experience a montage of scenes where they take the place of a person who, already near death but desperate to survive, sees NOX appear and is killed by her. After three deaths, the Chief finds themself walking on an infinitely long lakeside, surrounded by shadows. The shadows sense the Chief's living soul and attack, so they flee into a nearby building where they find a hospital ward housing a young blonde girl dressed in white, staring out the window at the red moon. The moment she turns to look at them, the shadows swarm in from outside and drag the Chief into darkness. The Chief awakens back in the interrogation room; NOX has been taken away.

The situation with NOX is complicated. But you see much more significant potential from that girl.
interrogation2:
[[[Nightingale]]] and the Chief theorize that the blonde girl at the lake is the original owner of NOX's body, and the core that the dead spirits have attached to. They plan to guide her to regain control of the body, which they hope would neutralize the threat that NOX poses to other Sinners and to the MBCC. Nightingale exposits that //Lakeside Residence//, the building seen in the illusion, was a sanatorium built in N.F. 61 on the south coast of DisSea, 23 years before the [[[DisSea Explosion]]]. The Chief uses the Shackles to create a link with NOX and reappears at the lakeside. The girl explains that she has been at the sanatorium for 6 years, suffering from a rare condition with only one other case in DisCity. A few years ago she couldn't even walk on her own, but she has improved since -- although her eyes the past two years have not been able to see clearly. The Chief attempts to read some letters for her, but the contents are covered by gray mist. She is saddened that her friends have not visited in a long time, but remains strong by looking forward to the sunrise -- a sunrise which the Chief knows will never come in this illusory world. The Chief asks if she would accept a way to cure herself if it meant taking the lives of others, and she refuses at first, but quickly becomes confused, recalling dreams where she has murdered many people. The shadows all around become agitated, reminding her of a promise that they made and clamoring for her to kill the Chief. She staggers out of the hospital ward while the shadows drag the Chief back, and the memory collapses, plunging the Chief again through countless experiences of others' deaths. But as they fall, the mist obscuring the letters disappears as well.

In the depths of a mind, there is only void and darkness.
interrogation3:
The girl awakens on the shore of DisSea in its modern, destroyed form. She tries to flee from the Corruptors around her, but even with her ailments having disappeared, she still is too weak, and falls. A shadow urges her, if she is really as desperate to live on as they are, to take them in and become their container. She witnesses one of the same deaths that the Chief did before, except she witnesses it from the perspective of NOX. She resists the shadows urging her to kill, but the shadows control her limbs and force her to take the boy's life. She is left crying in the darkness until the Chief appears. With the power of the girl's real name, Amber, the shadows are dispelled. They protest that she can't fight DisSea alone and that they must stay together in order to live, but Amber asserts that NOX's existence is not living and takes the Chief's hand. The Chief awakens in the real world and finds that, in spite of what appeared to be their victory in the illusion, NOX has gone manic, broken through her restraints, and escaped.

NOX went manic and fled out of the blue
interrogation4:
NOX crosses the [[[Broken Frontline]]] and enters the deepest part of DisSea. The Chief instructs Nightingale to tie a cable around them so they can be pulled back to safety, and then goes in after her. The Chief calls out to Amber, but when they find her, they see that there is no trace of her behind NOX's eyes. Corruptors swarm them, damaging the rescue cable. As the Chief's consciousness begins to succumb to the [[[Black Ring]]], Amber appears in front of them. She thanks the Chief for their help in reminder her what it meant to be human, but accepts that DisSea is her destined home. She apologizes that she can't protect them, but hopes that NOX will be able to instead. Nox carries the Chief out of DisSea, back towards the Broken Frontline. The [[[Phantom Moon]]] of DisSea gives way to the sunrise that Amber was waiting to see, but NOX does not react.

Amber disappeared. The one left behind is NOX instead of Amber or the berserk shadow. It's just an empty shell that once protected you.
arrestRec1: Traces of the subject whereabouts were found in DisSea after the FAC and MBCC sent out a large number of staff. Due to the harsh environment and the subject's dangerous powers, conventional means of arrest was not sufficient to capture the subject, who was eventually taken back by the Chief.
arrestRec2: There is no record of the subject's experience during the DisSea disaster. The information is destroyed in the explosion, and the MBCC is unable to investigate in the high-rish restricted area. The subject has blurry memory and is unable to perfectly recall the past. Further interrogation is to be needed after psychiatric treatment.
arrestRec3: The subject used to suffer from mutation caused by aberrant crystal hyperplasia of the soft tissues, and was not able to move around freely. The subject spent 6 years living in a nursing home, "Lakeside Home", during which her will to live came from the rising sun under the Black Ring.
arrestRec4: After the Black Ring's eruption, the subject wandered around in areas around DisSea for many years mentally unstable in an unconscious state. When wandering around the DisSea, the subject constantly shifted between the controlled and free mind, due to the strong desire to survive. The subjective consciousness of the subject seems to have no intention to harm humans.
servingTerm1: Close to becoming a Corruptor, the subject has been given "extra care" by the FAC and quarantined with the highest defense standard. No normal humans are allowed to go near the room.
servingTerm2: Curious about everything. Often asks the Chief to bring back all kinds of small appliances, game consoles, etc. and spends most of the time in the room playing with these objects to learn about modern society.
servingTerm3: Rarely approaches people due to contamination, but does not resist friendly socialization with some Syndicate Sinners. Being born before the DisSea explosion, only Syndicate has traces of the life of that era the subject is familiar with.
servingTerm4: Under the Chief's guarantee and supervision, the FAC finally treats NOX less harshly, and her cheerful personality gradually started to restore. But after a series of events, the humanity in her was completely gone.

//To help eliminate everyone's fear of NOX, you decide to hold a meet-and-greet.//

**System Notifications:** NOX is in the Outdoor Activity Area. People around her start to avoid her and whisper with each other. A 10-meter-radius depopulated zone forms around NOX.

**NOX:** ...

**NOX:** ...Yes.

**Inquirer:** Then are you gonna hunt me?

**Inquirer:** Ahhh, that sounds too scary!

**System Notifications:** To ease the nervous atmosphere, you decide to ask a question yourself.

 * **Inquirer:** Death metal? It surely suits her vibe.

baseVoicelines: [Obtain the Sinner] I can see.. the pain and madness consuming you... [Raise to Phase 1] The stronger a Sinner... the closer they are to destruction... [Raise to Phase 3] The abyss is no longer my prison. [Level Start] I hear the call of the abyss... [Win Battles] They will suffer no longer... That is good. [Lose Battles] No, they're not yet at peace... [Ultimate Skill] Death is your only destruction! [Die in Battles] I... don't want to... die... [Greeting] That was close. I was almost devoured by those voices again. Luckily... you came. [Conversation 1] The blood that stained this sword... I will never forget it. [Conversation 2] The Grim Reaper——Sinners call me that. I... like that name. [Conversation 3] This body once had a soul. Her memories and her name have been devoured by the abyss. I'm not her... I'm just the remains of her. [Special Conversation 1] Having a body like this... has its merits too. If I hadn't been infected, I wouldn't even have been able to walk normally. [Special Conversation 2] I still remember the sun rising in the east, sunlight shining in through the window, onto me. That was the moment I looked forward to the most. When... did this memory happen? [Special Conversation 3] For me, as long as you're here, death... is no longer the only answer. [Full Compliance] You make me aware of many... unfamiliar emotions. I look forward to your visit, I want to hear you talk, I want to see your smile. Is this a part of my forgotten past too? I want to... stay by your side. [Idle] Yes, I hear it... Are you in pain? Don't worry... Soon you'll be freed from it. [Annoyed] That's useless. Since long ago, my body... hasn't been able to feel anything. [Special Attention] Why are you willing to stay with... a monster like me? [Dispatch] I'm willing to roam the world for you. [Dispatch Complete] Does this result satisfy your expectations? [Level Up] Another step closer... [Pat Head] Don't do that, it's... dangerous for you.
attireVoicelines1:
[Attire Obtained]
Sunshine, chapel, and red flowers... make one so nostalgic... Strange. What is nostalgic?

[Greeting]
Prayers have been answered... You are back.

[Ordinary Contact 1]
I know praying can't bring me peace, but I had no other choice. Thankfully, you are here now.

[Ordinary Contact 2]
When I walked in the DisSea, there wasn't a second I did not pray to see the light of day. This chase gave me the strength to persevere.

[Ordinary Contact 3]
I still remember that chapel near the DisSea where I could see sunlight. I loved it there... But I never found that place again after I left...

[Ordinary Contact 4]
Do you prefer this look? I can stay like this forever if that's what you want.

[Idle] 
Please bring peace for them... for us...

[Special Attention] 
Did you look for me... because of your unfulfilled wish? Don't worry. I'll pray for you.

[Level Up}
Thank you, even though I have never prayed for strength.

[Pat Head]
Thank you for making me feel warm.

guide.title: Summary
guide.text:
NOX is a very strong F2P Sinner and will make story mode a breeze. All her damage comes from the ult, which will decimate anything in a 3x3 Area, but she is very reliant on getting enough energy to activate it. For that reason you want to run her with full energy Crimebrands (Tuning, Hope, Echo) for short battles, but for longer fights you can use the Embrace set.

Her ult double slashes are very impactful and easy to animation cancel, so she is a prime target to spend your movement points on.

crimebrandSets.name: Energy Set
crimebrandSets.note: Great for BFL and anytime you need to ult quickly.

crimebrandSets.note: Great way to boost damage and increase energy. Inversion allows her to attack more as well as gives her energy during her ult.

crimebrandSets.name: Bossfight
crimebrandSets.note: Overall more damage in Bossfights both for BFL and also ToA.

crimebrandSets.name: Budget Energy

crimebrandSets.name: Budget Normal Attack
crimebrandSets.note: Decent alternative until you get the other crimebrands.

attireVoicelines2:
[Attire Obtained]
I am NOX, the hunter o demons, the last of the Black Swords. Chosen one, tell me, do you too seek a final battle to seize that elusive dawn for humanity... If so, use me as your weapon!

[Greeting]
Let's set off. The sun has already risen. We're running out of time.

[Ordinary Contact 1]
Born to be a special combat weapon, the Black Swords are pariahs mixed with demon blood. No matter which side prevails, there will be no place for us in this world.

[Ordinary Contact 2]
Demons... are man-eating monsters that emerge from an unnamed darkness. Some of them may retain a human appearance, but don't be fooled. Demons have no emotions and are only driven by insatiable hunger. Once you face them, you have no other choice but to fight.

[Ordinary Contact 3]
Angel of Death... is that what they call me? What a shame. I'm no bloodless, tearless angel... With no wings, I can only crawl on the ground, yet I still yearn to look up at the sky.

[Ordinary Contact 4]
The sunrise by the lake, the peaceful village... Those are the only memories I've kept since I became a Black Sword. The arrival of the demons tore everything apart, including my past... 

[Idle] 
The demon blood will eventually devour my sanity. Such is the fate of every Black Sword... When that day comes, please grant me peace... I don't want to destroy everything I've protected.

[Special Attention] 
Prayers don't bring miracles, nor can they elicit mercy out of demons... Only fighting can grant us the right to live... Chosen one, I will be the sharp blade in your hands and I shall bring the last hope to you and all who struggle to survive!

[Level Up}
This is a necessary power.. and a necessary sacrifice.

[Pat Head]
Rest assured, I will not leave your side.

voicelines.Conversation 1 - KR: 피가 묻은 이 검을… 난 영원히 잊지 못해.
voicelines.Conversation 1 - CN: 这把剑沾染过的血……我永远不会忘记。
voicelines.Conversation 1 - TW: 這把劍沾染過的血……我永遠不會忘記。
voicelines.Conversation 2 - EN: The Grim Reaper—Sinners call me that. I... like that name.
voicelines.Conversation 2 - JP: 「死神」——コンビクトは私をそう呼ぶ。私は……この呼ばれ方が好きだ。
voicelines.Conversation 2 - KR: 사신'… 수감자들은 날 이렇게 불러. 난… 이 이름이 마음에 들어.
voicelines.Conversation 2 - CN: “死神”——禁闭者会这么叫我。我……喜欢这个称呼。
voicelines.Conversation 2 - TW: 「死神」——禁閉者會這麼叫我。我……喜歡這個稱呼。
voicelines.Conversation 3 - EN: This body once had a soul. Her memories and her name have been devoured by the abyss. I'm not her... I'm just the remains of her.
voicelines.Conversation 3 - JP: この体にはかつて魂があったが、彼女の記憶も名前も深淵に飲み込まれてしまった。私は彼女ではない……彼女の残骸に過ぎない。
voicelines.Conversation 3 - KR: 이 몸에도 영혼이 있었지. 그녀의 기억, 그녀의 이름 모두 심연에 잠식되었어. 난 그녀가 아니야… 나는 그녀의 잔해일 뿐.
voicelines.Conversation 3 - CN: 这具身体曾经有过灵魂。她的记忆，她的名字，都被深渊吞噬了。我不是她……我只是她的残骸。
voicelines.Conversation 3 - TW: 這具身體曾經有過靈魂。她的記憶，她的名字，都被深淵吞噬了。我不是她……我只是她的殘骸。
voicelines.Special Conversation 1 - EN: Having a body like this... has its merits too. If I hadn't been infected, I wouldn't even have been able to walk normally.
voicelines.Special Conversation 1 - JP: こんな姿になっても……悪いことばかりではない。もし感染していなかったら、私は普通に歩くことさえできなかったはずだ。
voicelines.Special Conversation 1 - KR: 이 모양으로 바뀐 것도… 나쁜 것만 같지는 않아. 감염되지 않았다면, 난 정상적으로 걸어보지도 못했을 거야.
voicelines.Special Conversation 1 - CN: 变成这副模样……也不全是坏处。如果没有感染，恐怕我连正常的行走都无法做到。
voicelines.Special Conversation 1 - TW: 變成這副模樣……也不全是壞處。如果沒有感染，恐怕我連正常的行走都無法做到。
voicelines.Special Conversation 2 - EN: I still remember the sun rising in the east, sunlight shining in through the window, onto me. That was the moment I looked forward to the most. When... did this memory happen?
voicelines.Special Conversation 2 - JP: 朝日が東から昇り、窓に光が差し込み、私の上に降り注いだことを覚えている。それは私が待ち望んでいた瞬間だった。あれは一体……いつの記憶なのだろう。
voicelines.Special Conversation 2 - KR: 아침 해가 동쪽에서 떠올라 따스한 햇살이 창문을 뚫고 내 몸 위를 비춰주던 기억이 나. 내가 하루 중 제일 기다리던 시간이었는데. 근데 대체… 언제적 기억이지?
voicelines.Special Conversation 2 - CN: 我还记得，朝阳从东边升起，阳光照进窗户，落在我身上。那曾是我最期待的时刻。那究竟是……什么时候的记忆呢？
voicelines.Special Conversation 2 - TW: 我還記得，朝陽從東邊升起，陽光照進窗戶，落在我身上。那曾是我最期待的時刻。那究竟是……什麼時候的記憶呢？
voicelines.Special Conversation 3 - EN: For me, as long as you're here, death... is no longer the only answer.
voicelines.Special Conversation 3 - JP: 私にとって、貴方がいる限り、死は……唯一の答えでは無くなる。
voicelines.Special Conversation 3 - KR: 너만 있다면 죽음만이 나의… 유일한 해답이 아닐 수 있어.
voicelines.Special Conversation 3 - CN: 对我来说，只要有你在，死亡……就不再是唯一的答案。
voicelines.Special Conversation 3 - TW: 對我來說，只要有你在，死亡……就不再是唯一的答案。
voicelines.Full Compliance - EN: You make me aware of many... unfamiliar emotions. I look forward to your visit, I want to hear you talk, I want to see your smile. Is this a part of my forgotten past too? I want to... stay by your side.
voicelines.Full Compliance - JP: 貴方は私に多くの……知らなかった感情を気づかせてくれた。貴方が来るのが楽しみになり、もっと貴方の話が聞きたい、貴方の笑顔が見たいと思うようになった。こんな気持ちを過去の私は持っていたのか……？今は……貴方のそばにいたい。
voicelines.Full Compliance - KR: 넌 나에게 다양한… 익숙하지 않은 정서를 느끼게 해줬어. 난 네가 기다려져. 더 많은 이야기를 듣고 싶고 너의 웃는 얼굴을 보고 싶어. 이것도 내가 잊어버린 과거야? 난… 네 곁에 남아있고 싶어.
voicelines.Full Compliance - CN: 你让我察觉到许多……不熟悉的情绪。我期待你的到来，想听你说更多，想看到你的笑容。这也是被我忘记的过去吗？我想……留在你身边。
voicelines.Full Compliance - TW: 你讓我察覺到許多……不熟悉的情緒。我期待你的到來，想聽你說更多，想看到你的笑容。這也是被我忘記的過去嗎？我想……留在你身邊。
voicelines.Idle - EN: Yes, I hear it... Are you in pain? Don't worry... Soon you'll be freed from it.
voicelines.Idle - JP: ああ、聞こえた……苦しいんだろう？安心して……すぐに解放してあげるから。
voicelines.Idle - KR: 그래, 들었어… 고통스럽지? 괜찮아… 이제 곧 벗어날 수 있어.
voicelines.Idle - CN: 是的，我听到了……很痛苦吧？
voicelines.Idle - TW: 是的，我聽到了……很痛苦吧？放心……很快就可以解脫了。
voicelines.Annoyed - EN: That's useless. Since long ago, my body... hasn't been able to feel anything.
voicelines.Annoyed - JP: そんなことをしても意味がない。私の体はとっくに……何も感じなくなっている。
voicelines.Annoyed - KR: 그래봤자 아무 의미 없어. 내 몸은 오래전에… 아무것도 느끼지 못하거든.
voicelines.Annoyed - CN: 这么做没有意义。我早就……什么都感觉不到了。
voicelines.Annoyed - TW: 這麼做沒有意義。我的身體早就……什麼都感覺不到了。
voicelines.Special Attention - EN: Why are you willing to stay with... a monster like me?
voicelines.Special Attention - JP: 私みたいな……化け物と、一緒にいてくれるのか？
voicelines.Special Attention - CN: 你居然愿意，和我这样的……怪物，待在一起吗？
voicelines.Special Attention - TW: 你居然願意，和我這樣的……怪物，待在一起嗎？
voicelines.Dispatch - EN: I'm willing to roam the world for you.
voicelines.Dispatch - JP: 貴方のためなら、この世を駆け回ってもいい。
voicelines.Dispatch - KR: 난 널 위해 세상을 걸어갈 수 있어.
voicelines.Dispatch - CN: 我愿意为你在世间行走。
voicelines.Dispatch - TW: 我願意為你在世間行走。
voicelines.Dispatch Complete - EN: Does this result satisfy your expectations?
voicelines.Dispatch Complete - JP: この結果は、貴方の期待に応えられている？
voicelines.Dispatch Complete - CN: 这样的结果，满足你的期待吗？
voicelines.Dispatch Complete - TW: 這樣的結果，滿足你的期待嗎？
voicelines.Pat Head - EN: Don't do that, it's... dangerous for you.
voicelines.Pat Head - JP: そんなことしないで。……危険だから。
voicelines.Pat Head - KR: 이렇게 하면 안 돼. 이건… 위험해.
voicelines.Pat Head - CN: 不要这么做，这样……会很危险。
voicelines.Pat Head - TW: 不要這麼做，這樣……會很危險。

voicelines.Attire Obtained - EN: Sunshine, chapel, and red flowers... make one so nostalgic... Strange. What is nostalgic?
voicelines.Attire Obtained - JP: 日差し、教会、赤い花……懐かしい……懐かしいってなに？
voicelines.Attire Obtained - KR: 햇살, 성당, 붉은 꽃… 정말 그립다… 이상하다, 그리움이란 무엇이지?
voicelines.Attire Obtained - CN: 阳光、教堂、红色的花……真让人怀念……奇怪，怀念是什么？
voicelines.Attire Obtained - TW: 陽光、教堂、紅色的花……真讓人懷念……奇怪，懷念是什麼？
voicelines.Greeting - EN: Prayers have been answered... You are back.
voicelines.Greeting - JP: 祈りが届いた……おかえり。
voicelines.Greeting - CN: 祈祷，得到了回应……你回来了。
voicelines.Greeting - TW: 祈禱，得到了回應……你回來了。
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 1 - EN: I know praying can't bring me peace, but I had no other choice. Thankfully, you are here now.
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 1 - JP: 祈りは安らぎをもたらしてくれるわけではない。それは分かっていた。それでも昔の私にはこれしか方法がなかった。幸い、今はあなたがいる。
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 1 - KR: 기도가 내게 평안을 가져다줄 수 없다는 것을 알지만, 과거의 나에겐 다른 방법이 없었어. 하지만 정말 다행이야, 이제는 네가 여기 있어.
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 1 - CN: 我知道，祈求并不能为我带来安宁，可过去的我别无他法。万幸，如今你在这里。
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 1 - TW: 我知道，祈求並不能為我帶來安寧，可過去的我別無他法。萬幸，如今你在這裡。
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 2 - EN: When I walked in the DisSea, there wasn't a second I did not pray to see the light of day. This chase gave me the strength to persevere.
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 2 - JP: 内海にいた頃、いつも夜明けの光が見えることを祈っていた。朝日への思いが、私に力をくれた。
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 2 - KR: 디스씨에서 걸을 때, 나는 언제나 내게 한 줄기 빛이 비치기를 기도했어. 이걸 쫓는 과정이 내게 계속 나아갈 힘이 되어줬어.
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 2 - CN: 在内海中行走时，我无时无刻不在祈祷着能看到曙光。这追逐的过程，给了我继续下去的力量。
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 2 - TW: 在內海中行走時，我無時無刻不在祈禱著能看到曙光。這追逐的過程，給了我繼續下去的力量。
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 3 - EN: I still remember that chapel near the DisSea where I could see sunlight. I loved it there... But I never found that place again after I left...
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 3 - JP: 内海の辺境に小さな教会があったことを覚えている。あそこは太陽の光が見えるから、好きだった……でも、あの教会を二度と見つけることはできなかったな……。
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 3 - KR: 내 기억에 디스씨 근처에 작은 성당이 하나 있었던 것 같은데, 나는 그곳에 비추는 햇볕을… 아주 좋아했었어. 그때 떠난 후로 다시는 그곳을 찾지 못했어…
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 3 - CN: 我还记得，内海的边缘有一座小教堂。那里能看见阳光，我很喜欢……可是，那次离开之后，我就再也没有找到过那个地方……
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 3 - TW: 我還記得，內海的邊緣有一座小教堂。那裡能看見陽光，我很喜歡……可是，那次離開之後，我就再也沒有找到過那個地方……
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 4 - EN: Do you prefer this look? I can stay like this forever if that's what you want...
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 4 - JP: この姿のほうが好きなのか？私はずっとこのままでも構わない。貴方がそう望むなら……。
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 4 - KR: 이 자세가 마음에 들어? 계속 이렇게 있어 줄 수도 있어. 이게 네 소원이라면…
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 4 - CN: 你更喜欢，这副姿态吗？我可以一直保持这样，如果这是你的愿望……
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 4 - TW: 你更喜歡，這副姿態嗎？我可以一直保持這樣，如果這是你的願望……
voicelines.Idle - EN: Please bring peace for them... for us...
voicelines.Idle - JP: ……どうか彼らに……そして私たちに……安らぎを……
voicelines.Idle - CN: 请为他们……为我们，带去安宁……
voicelines.Idle - TW: 請為他們……為我們，帶去安寧……
voicelines.Special Attention - EN: Did you look for me... because of your unfulfilled wish? Don't worry. I'll pray for you.
voicelines.Special Attention - JP: 貴方は私を見つけた……叶えられない願いでもあるのか？大丈夫だ。私が貴方のために祈りを捧げるから。
voicelines.Special Attention - KR: 나를 찾은 건… 이룰 수 없는 소원이 있기 때문인가? 걱정 마, 널 위해 기도해 줄게.
voicelines.Special Attention - CN: 你找到了我……是有什么无法实现的愿望吗？别担心，我会为你祈祷的。
voicelines.Special Attention - TW: 你找到了我……是有什麼無法實現的願望嗎？別擔心，我會為你祈禱的。
voicelines.Level Up - EN: Thank you, even though I have never prayed for strength.
voicelines.Level Up - JP: 力を求めたことはない……でも、ありがとう。
voicelines.Level Up - KR: 고마워, 비록 내가 힘을 얻기를 바란 적은 없지만.
voicelines.Level Up - CN: 谢谢你，即便我不曾祈求过获得力量。
voicelines.Level Up - TW: 謝謝你，即便我不曾祈求過獲得力量。
voicelines.Pat Head - EN: Thank you for making me feel warm.
voicelines.Pat Head - CN: 谢谢你，我感觉到了温暖。
voicelines.Pat Head - TW: 謝謝你，我感覺到了溫暖。

voicelines.Attire Obtained - EN: I am NOX, the hunter of demons, the last of the Black Swords. Chosen one, tell me, do you too seek a final battle to seize that elusive dawn for humanity... If so, use me as your weapon!
voicelines.Attire Obtained - JP: 私はNOX。妖鬼の狩人であり、最後の黒剣。運命の人よ、教えてほしい。貴方も人類の儚い夜明けのために決戦を求めるのか……もしそうなら、私を使ってほしい。
voicelines.Attire Obtained - KR: 나는 NOX, 요괴 사냥꾼이자 최후의 다크 소드다. 운명의 선택을 받은 인간이여, 인류를 위해 그 희미한 여명을 쟁취하고자 결전을 치르려 하는가… 그렇다면 나를 선택해라!
voicelines.Attire Obtained - CN: 我是诺克斯，追猎妖鬼之人，最后的黑剑。命定之人啊，请告诉我，你是否也在寻求一场决战，为人类争取那缥缈的黎明……若是如此，便请使用我吧！
voicelines.Attire Obtained - TW: 我是NOX，追獵妖鬼之人，最後的黑劍。命定之人啊，請告訴我，你是否也在尋求一場決戰，為人類爭取那縹緲的黎明……若是如此，便請使用我吧！
voicelines.Greeting - EN: Let's set off. The sun has already risen. We're running out of time.
voicelines.Greeting - JP: 出発しよう、日が昇った。私たちには、あまり時間がない。
voicelines.Greeting - KR: 출발하자. 해가 떴으니 우리에게 남은 시간이 얼마 없어.
voicelines.Greeting - CN: 启程吧，太阳已经升起，我们没有太多时间了。
voicelines.Greeting - TW: 啟程吧，太陽已經升起，我們沒有太多時間了。
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 1 - EN: Born to be a special combat weapon, the Black Swords are pariahs mixed with demon blood. No matter which side prevails, there will be no place for us in this world.
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 1 - JP: 黒剣は、妖鬼の血肉が混ざり合った異種で、戦闘兵器だ。どちらが勝っても、この世界に私たちの居場所はなくなる。
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 1 - KR: 다크 소드는 요괴의 피와 살이 섞인 다른 종족이자 전투 병기지. 어느 쪽이 이기든 이 세상에 더 이상 우리가 설 자리는 없어.
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 1 - CN: 黑剑，是混合了妖鬼血肉的异类，战斗的兵器。无论哪方获胜，这个世界都不再会有我们的容身之所。
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 1 - TW: 黑劍，是混合了妖鬼血肉的異類，戰鬥的兵器。無論哪方獲勝，這個世界都不再會有我們的容身之所。
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 2 - EN: Demons... are man-eating monsters that emerge from an unnamed darkness. Some of them may retain a human appearance, but don't be fooled. Demons have no emotions and are only driven by insatiable hunger. Once you face them, you have no other choice but to fight.
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 2 - JP: 妖鬼とは……未知の闇から現れる悪魔で、人を食らう怪物だ。中には人間の姿を持つ者もいるが、騙されないでほしい——妖鬼には感情がない。ただ果てない飢えによって突き動かされている。彼らに出会った瞬間、残される選択肢は戦うのみだ。
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 2 - KR: 요괴는… 알 수 없는 어둠 속에서 쏟아져 나온 악마이자 인간을 잡아먹는 괴물이야. 그들 중 일부는 인간의 모습을 하고 있을지도 모르니 속아선 안 돼. 요괴에게는 감정이 없어. 끝없는 허기에 허우적댈 뿐이지. 그것들과 마주치게 되면 선택은 하나, 그들과 맞서는 것뿐이야.
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 2 - CN: 妖鬼……是自不知名的黑暗中涌现的恶魔，噬人的怪物。它们中的一部分或许还会保留人类的外观，但请不要被蒙蔽——妖鬼没有情感，只会被无尽的饥饿所左右。从遇见它们的那一刻起，就只剩下战斗这一个选择。
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 2 - TW: 妖鬼……是自不知名的黑暗中湧現的惡魔，噬人的怪物。它們中的一部分或許還會保留人類的外觀，但請不要被蒙蔽——妖鬼沒有情感，只會被無盡的飢餓所左右。從遇見它們的那一刻起，就只剩下戰鬥這一個選擇。
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 3 - EN: Angel of Death... is that what they call me? What a shame. I'm no bloodless, tearless angel... With no wings, I can only crawl on the ground, yet I still yearn to look up at the sky.
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 3 - JP: 死の天使……私は本当にそう呼ばれているのか？残念だが、私は血も涙もない天使ではない……私は翼もなく、地を這うことしかできないが、それでも空を見上げたい。
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 3 - KR: 죽음의 천사… 그들이 날 그렇게 부르던가? 안타깝지만 난 피도 눈물도 없는 천사가 아니야… 날개 하나 없이 그저 땅 위를 기어다니지만 하늘을 올려다보고 싶어 하는 존재이지.
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 3 - CN: 死亡天使……他们是这么称呼我的么？真可惜，我不是无血无泪的天使……我没有翅膀，明明只能在地上爬行，却还是想要仰望天空。
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 3 - TW: 死亡天使……他們是這麼稱呼我的嗎？真可惜，我不是無血無淚的天使……我沒有翅膀，明明只能在地上爬行，卻還是想要仰望天空。
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 4 - EN: The sunrise by the lake, the peaceful village... Those are the only memories I've kept since I became a Black Sword. The arrival of the demons tore everything apart, including my past...
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 4 - JP: 湖畔の日の出、のどかな村……それが黒剣となった私に唯一残った思い出だ。妖鬼の出現は、私の過去も含めて全てを引き裂いた……
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 4 - KR: 호숫가의 일출, 고요한 마을… 다크 소드가 된 이후, 내게 남은 기억은 이것뿐이야. 요괴가 나타나 모든 것을 갈기갈기 찢어버렸고, 그렇게 나의 과거도 사라져 버렸어...
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 4 - CN: 湖边的日出，宁静的村庄……那是我成为黑剑之后仅剩的记忆。妖鬼的到来撕碎了一切，也包括我的过去……
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 4 - TW: 湖邊的日出，寧靜的村莊……那是我成為黑劍之後僅剩的記憶。妖鬼的到來撕碎了一切，也包括我的過去……
voicelines.Idle - EN: The demon blood will eventually devour my sanity. Such is the fate of every Black Sword... When that day comes, please grant me peace... I don't want to destroy everything I've protected.
voicelines.Idle - JP: やがて妖鬼の血肉が私の理性を蝕む。これが全ての黒剣の宿命だ……その日が来たら、どうか私に安らぎを……かつて守ってきたものを壊したくない。
voicelines.Idle - KR: 요괴의 피와 살은 결국 내 이성마저 집어삼킬 거야. 이게 바로 다크 소드의 숙명이야… 그날이 오게 되면 부디 내게 안식을 내려줘… 내가 지켰던 모든 걸 내 손으로 망치고 싶지 않아.
voicelines.Idle - CN: 妖鬼的血肉终将吞噬我的理性，这是每一个黑剑的宿命……等那天到来的时候，请给予我安宁……我不想毁掉曾经守护的一切。
voicelines.Idle - TW: 妖鬼的血肉終將吞噬我的理性，這是每一個黑劍的宿命……等那天到來的時候，請給予我安寧……我不想毀掉曾經守護的一切。
voicelines.Special Attention - EN: Prayers don't bring miracles, nor can they elicit mercy out of demons... Only fighting can grant us the right to live... Chosen one, I will be the sharp blade in your hands and I shall bring the last hope to you and all who struggle to survive!
voicelines.Special Attention - JP: 祈りは奇跡を呼び起こせず、妖鬼の憐憫と代わることもできない……私たちに生きる権利を与えてくれる唯一のものは、戦うことだ……運命の人よ、私は貴方の鋭い刃となり、貴方のために、生き残るためにもがく全ての人のために、最後の希望をもたらす！
voicelines.Special Attention - KR: 기도만으로는 기적도, 요괴의 연민도 불러일으킬 수 없어… 맞서 싸우는 것만이 우리가 생존할 수 있는 유일한 방법이야… 운명의 선택을 받은 인간이여, 내가 너의 예리한 칼날이 되어 너를 위해, 살고자 발버둥 치는 모든 이에게 마지막 희망을 가져다주지!
voicelines.Special Attention - CN: 祈求唤不来奇迹，更换不来妖鬼的怜悯……唯有战斗，才能给予我们活下去的权力……命定之人啊，我会成为你手中的利刃，为你，为每一个挣扎求生的人带去最后的希望！
voicelines.Special Attention - TW: 祈求喚不來奇迹，更換不來妖鬼的憐憫……唯有戰鬥，才能給予我們活下去的權力……命定之人啊，我會成為你手中的利刃，為你，為每一個掙扎求生的人帶去最後的希望！
voicelines.Level Up - EN: This is a necessary power... and a necessary sacrifice.
voicelines.Level Up - JP: これは必要な力であり……必要な犠牲でもある。
voicelines.Level Up - KR: 이건 없어선 안 될 힘이자… 불가피한 희생이야.
voicelines.Level Up - CN: 这是必要的力量……也是必要的牺牲。
voicelines.Level Up - TW: 這是必要的力量……也是必要的犧牲。
voicelines.Pat Head - EN: Rest assured, I will not leave your side.
voicelines.Pat Head - JP: 心配しなくていい。私は貴方から離れない。
voicelines.Pat Head - KR: 걱정할 필요 없어. 난 널 떠나지 않을 테니까.
voicelines.Pat Head - CN: 不用担心，我不会离开你的。
voicelines.Pat Head - TW: 不用擔心，我不會離開你的。
